channel.title: Crow (Blue Dragon Special Social)
channel.description:
**Win Condition: Defeat all who oppose the Blue Dragon.**
**Passives:** **Mimicry** - Your vote counts twice. It still shows up as 1 next to the name but actually will count twice, this is so it is harder to prove yourself.
**Day Abilities:** **Crow's Mark** - Remove someones ability to vote for the day (3 uses) **Helping Hand** - Give someone else the ability to vote twice. Similar to Mimicry to where it will still show up as 1 vote but actually counts twice. (2 uses)
**Night Abilities:** **Crow on the shoulder** - Pick a target, you will then see any whispers that include them (Inf uses) **Trust me** - Pick a target, the next day they will immediately be executed (1 use)

item.title: Crow (Blue Dragon Special Social)
item.dc:creator: EliThePsycho
item.description:
Crow_is_dead:

Mimicry - Your vote counts twice. It still shows up as 1 next to the name but actually will count twice,

this should only count twice in trials

Crow_is_dead:

Crow on the shoulder - Pick a target, you will then see any whispers that include them (Inf uses)

too confirmable

Crow_is_dead:

Trust me - Pick a target, the next day they will immediately be executed (1 use)

this is
questionable
should probably just be a straight-up attack

Crow_is_dead:

Crow’s Mark - Remove someones ability to vote for the day (3 uses)

too confirmable

Crow_is_dead:

Helping Hand - Give someone else the ability to vote twice. Similar to Mimicry to where it will still show up as 1 vote but actually counts twice. (2 uses)

same with this, should only be on trial, and they shouldn’t be notified

item.title: Crow (Blue Dragon Special Social)
item.dc:creator: katze
item.description:
Crow (Blue Dragon Special Social)

is it special or social? did you mean unique?

i also kinda think nobles existence fills a decent bit of the niche that this class would

since it has forcevote for voting manipulation and court spy for whispers

item.title: Crow (Blue Dragon Special Social)

item.description:
Win Condition: Defeat all who oppose the Blue Dragon.

Passives:
Mimicry - Your vote counts twice. It still shows up as 1 next to the name but actually will count twice, this is so it is harder to prove yourself.

Day Abilities:
Crow’s Mark - Remove someones ability to vote for the day (3 uses)
Helping Hand - Give someone else the ability to vote twice. Similar to Mimicry to where it will still show up as 1 vote but actually counts twice. (2 uses)

Night Abilities:
Crow on the shoulder - Pick a target, you will then see any whispers that include them (Inf uses)
Trust me - Pick a target, the next day they will immediately be executed (1 use)
